decisions.description: The case type specific JSON elements of the outgoing posts to Tekmir will be defined below. Based on Case Type
decisions.name: Case_Type_Specific_Field_Check
decisions.label: Case Type Specific Field Check

Flow.description: DEPRECATED SENDS TO TEKMIR STAGING ENVIRONMENT 12/6/24 - DIR - Converting to autolaunch 12/4/2024 - Update to send inverse value for Before seeing advertising about the lawsuit, did you know there might be a connection between Depo Provera and your tumor? -- (Depo Provera) QUESTION 11/27 - Update to clientIsExecutorOfEstate in Common JSON and howClientFirstLearnedOfCause in Depo JSON 11/14/2024 - Updates to the flow to build common JSON elements and case type specific JSON elements 11/13/2024 - Updates to injuredPartyHasHistoryOfSmoking and primaryExposureState

formulas.name: executorYesNo
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Confirm_if_caller_is_next_of_kin__c},"The caller is the formal next of kin (when through all levels and they are the next in line)"),"Yes","No")

formulas.description: Formula to return the inverse value of the 'Before seeing advertising about the lawsuit, did you know there might be a connection between Depo Provera and your tumor? -- (Depo Provera)' (i.e. CM_Advertising_Check__c) to Tekmir / D&C because they ask the question differently
formulas.name: fx_CmAdvertisingCheckInverseValue

formulas.description: IF Date First Learned of is not blank THEN Date First Learned ELSE Discovery Date
formulas.name: fx_DepoDiscoveryOfCauseDate
fx_ExecutorBoolean
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Confirm_if_caller_is_next_of_kin__c},"The caller is the formal next of kin (when through all levels and they are the next in line)"),true,false)

Flow.label: DEP BRIO | Intake | Tekmir Intake Send
